artifacts.summary: Analysis of weak_completeness vs semantic_weak_completeness architecture with dual API refactoring recommendation

summary: Refactoring is feasible using a dual API approach: keep sorried valid-based theorems (weak_completeness, finite_strong_completeness) alongside new sorry-free semantic versions (semantic_strong_completeness, consistent_implies_semantic_satisfiable). The architectural gap in the forward truth lemma prevents eliminating valid entirely without breaking API changes.
